structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: When there is a question whether a particular record or group of records should be destroyed, the commission shall have exclusive authority to decide whether or not the record or group of records are to be destroyed.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 52. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. V, sec. 4. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 27.
